entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
